itemInfo.itemDesc: A design required to craft a Capheon Noble costume. This is used in the Wizard’s costume. \n- How to Obtain: This can be found in the Calpheon Tailor Amity Shop.

item.name: [Wizard] Calpheon Noble Suit
item.desc:
A suit for Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.
- Item effect: Amity +15% from a conversation
※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you'll get the same suit with an additional effect of moving speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as the pearl costume.
If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Marketplace.
